function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to outdoor spaces for residents in buildings","Impact":"Reduced physical and mental well-being, increased stress, and limited opportunities for physical activity","Mitigation":"Incorporation of external spaces like balconies, terraces, or flat roofs in building designs, compliance with regulations for the creation of outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Green building technologies, thermal insulation methods, ventilation systems","People":"Residents, building developers, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Building developers, architects, urban planners"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and sunlight in enclosed balconies","Impact":"Compromised air quality, lack of sunlight exposure, and reduced thermal comfort","Mitigation":"Ensuring that enclosed balconies are designed to allow for ventilation and sunlight exposure, adherence to building codes and standards for enclosed spaces","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, sustainable building materials, building design software","People":"Architects, building designers, building occupants","Owner":"Building developers, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of natural green spaces and amenities in the building's surrounding environment","Impact":"Increased stress, reduced happiness levels, and limited opportunities for social interaction and physical activity","Mitigation":"Incorporation of natural green spaces, amenities, and connectivity in the building's surrounding environment, adherence to urban planning guidelines for promoting health and well-being","Technologies":"Green space planning software, urban design tools, environmental impact assessment tools","People":"Urban planners, landscape architects, building developers","Owner":"Urban planners, building developers"}]}
